attributes.title: Worst App I’ve downloaded
attributes.review: For starters it took forever to download. Second once it downloaded it used up ALL of my storage. Even after all of this when I went onto the app it began threatening to take money from my apple account. Deleted the app. Complete SCAM. Worst app on the App Store. So disappointed. 😤😡 IF I COULD MAKE THIS RATING A ZERO I WOULD.

attributes.title: Almost Made Me Loose My Phone...
attributes.review: When I downloaded this app all I got was ADDS ADDS ADDS like WHYYYYY then I was so tired of them so I closed the app then my phone started to freeze up and all I saw was Shrek’s face like ya I love him (shrek OPPAR for life) but he was like EVERYWHERE I couldn’t tap anything and I couldn’t use my phone until two days later

attributes.title: The app is poorly made and could be made better
attributes.review: The app is poorly made where it is a hassle to navigate the main page and swapping between the pages lags the app so you have to restart it. For someone with millions of dollars it could be a lot better.

attributes.title: this app stank🤢
attributes.review: this app took 17 days to download and after i downloaded it, it wouldn’t open and after continuously trying to open the app i started getting messages and then it deleted itself off my phone i then finalized it again after 17 days of it taking to download and the same thing happened but this time my phone got hacked and now i cant use it anymore. so because of this app i now have to buy a brand new phone. i’ve  never had an experience like this with any other app.

attributes.title: Almost lost everything
attributes.review: IMMEDIATELY after this was downloaded my phone just stopped working. I work from home & can’t afford a computer. I’m an orphan and have no friends so I can’t use anyone’s devices. Almost lost my job and had to spend my life’s savings on a new phone😭😭😭

attributes.title: Slow and improper
attributes.review: This app was extremely slow and hard to load anything!!! I have exceptional WiFi so it’s not that. I cannot believe how slow it took to not only down load the app but to just load basic things in it as well.

attributes.title: Never get this app
attributes.review: This app was a complete waste of time and was glitchy. As soon as I opened the app as was kicked off as if I was getting booted off. I was unable to refresh the pages. All in all this app needs to be taken down and never be brought back. This app is just a No❤️

attributes.title: 2 much orange 🍊
attributes.review: I mean I don’t mind orange but he did you really have to put that much on the first page. When trying to log in the fake tan and seemingly disgusting wig was far too much for me too focus.  I think you’ve accidentally placed a Cheeto instead of the trumpet 🎺 please fix this bug change 💓

attributes.title: Ew✨🙈🧚💖
attributes.review: I was downloading this app to support my beloved president who isnt racist or homophobic or a rapist, then when i was looking through the app it asked me to send him pics even tho he has a wife and a child😭😭😔💥 i never knew my president was SUCH a pervert💔✨🧚🙈 please take down the app it HURT seeing people send their pics to donald trump without his Wife knowing😭💔🧚✨💖

attributes.title: REPUBLICANS BEWARE‼️
attributes.review: i downloaded this app to keep up with my party because i am DEFINITELY (definitely btw) a trump supporter/ republican and wanted to show my love for mr president by doing so. however, this app STOLE MY INFORMATION AND THE TRUMP CAMPAIGN TEXT GOT MY ADDRESS AND THE NEXT THING I KNEW, MY BANK ACCOUNT WAS EMPTY FROM PURCHASES THROUGH HIS MERCH STORE! DISGUSTING! TAKE THIS APP DOWN AS IT WILL RUIN LIVES NO MATTER HOW MUCH YOU LOVE THE RACIST, MISOGYNISTIC, RAPIST, HOMOPHOBIC, ETC. MAN. HE DOESN'T CARE ABOUT THE COUNTRY, NOR WILL HE EVER CARE ABOUT US! HE ONLY CARES ABOUT HIMSELF‼️‼️
